remarks: Kernel of the vector to dual map.  Line 16 in [Holland95] p. 14.  TODO: eliminate ` F ` hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmaplkr.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmaplkr.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmaplkr.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmaplkr.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmaplkr.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
hdmaplkr.y $e |- Y = ( LKer ` U ) $.
hdmaplkr.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmaplkr.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmaplkr.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmaplkr $p |- ( ph -> ( Y ` ( S ` X ) ) = ( O ` { X } ) ) $.
